newsitem.title: USA: North Face Inc spring '97 orders up.
newsitem.headline: North Face Inc spring '97 orders up.

text.p: The North Face Inc Monday reported continued growth in its wholesale business with advance orders for the Spring 1997 season up 33 percent over Spring 1996 advance orders.

For the Spring 1997 season, advance wholesale orders are $42.6 million. This compares with $32.1 million for Spring 1996 advance wholesale orders. Spring advance orders generally ship in the first and second quarter of the year.
North Face designs and distributes technically sophisticated outerwear, skiwear, functional sportswear, tents, sleeping bags and backpacks under The North Face name.
